Banner.Description: With 5 years of experience, I specialize in crafting frontend systems, reusable components, and innovative technological solutions to enhance web accessibility. My focus is on writing clean, scalable, and maintainable code, primarily in Angular and in general JavaScript.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: With over 5 years of professional experience, I have embraced diverse roles such as Frontend Developer, Tutor, and Technical Lead. My passion lies in crafting innovative solutions that drive impactful results.
I specialize in enhancing systems, optimizing performance, standardizing development patterns, and bringing forward ideas that elevate the value of every project I contribute to.
Beyond 9 to 5, I enjoy creating tools and applications for personal use, blending utility with creativity.
My witchcraft utilizes a wide range of technologies, including (but not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

FeatureProjects.Title: Recent Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CM-UI
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a comprehensive web application at CareMonitor for Patient Management, Remote Monitoring, and Virtual Care. Built using Angular and Node.js, with support for WebSockets, multiple third-party integrations, and infrastructure fully managed on AWS.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CM-Careplan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a scalable and modular web application within an NX monorepo architecture for managing patient care plans. The application leverages Angular for the frontend and Node.js for the backend, featuring real-time updates via WebSockets, seamless integration with multiple third-party services, and a robust infrastructure hosted on AWS. Designed to streamline care plan creation, tracking, and collaboration among healthcare providers.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: Write to me, and lets build something great together.
